comment.author: 18778996@N00
comment._content: The SS Arabic was an ocean liner which entered service in 1903 for the White Star Line. She was sunk on 19 August 1915 by the German submarine U-24, 50 mi (80 km) south of Kinsale. Her sinking caused a diplomatic incident. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SS_Arabic_%281902%29
